page.title: 07THE 'HAUNT' (ONGAR)
page.content: The main attraction for teenagers in Ongar is the youth centre which is situated at the Haunt premises in Marden Ash.Annual membership for {Juniors (10_13yrs)}is{50p}and for {Seniors (13_21yrs)}is{Â£2.50,}Â£2 of which is paid by the centre to the County Council. Activities available range from {discos}to{mini_cruises}to countries like{Germany}and{Scandinavia.}Most of the activities are based on the premises, but sports facilities are available at reduced prices at the{ {Sports Centre}which is in the grounds of Ongar Comprehensive. Although the haunt has been open in it's present site for 14 years, no one can say why it is called the Haunt, but the story is that a soldier hanged himself from a beam in the roof and still haunts the site.
